title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama; fluent API for chat, generate, pull, list models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and plugins.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team: use local models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node to call Ollama models inside workflows (no API key needed).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + Chroma for local Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin to run local LLM prompts on your notes using Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin for AI-assisted writing and summarization via Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial async Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio and streaming support.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Experimental Zig client for Ollama generated from OpenAPI spec.
